Function template make_histogram_with

boost::histogram::make_histogram_with — Make histogram from compile-time axis configuration and custom storage.

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/histogram/make_histogram.hpp>


template<typename Storage, typename Axis, class... Axes> 
  auto make_histogram_with(Storage && storage, Axis && axis, Axes &&... axes);

Description

Parameters:

axes

Other axis instances.

axis

First axis instance.

storage

Storage or container with standard interface (any vector, array, or map).
